Just picked this up, I am assuming ( a dangerous thing in any game )
this is the shodai or nidai Yoshitsugu as I can find no reference of
any of the other 5 doing Iron work ?. any thoughts on the contrary ?,
or a confirmation of my assumptions ?.

> All, does anyone know if the Akao smith Yoshitsugu ( Shodai and
Nidai ) 
> was the only smith of this group ( 9 generations I think ) that
worked

> Sukashi after they moved to Edo, but worked in iron whilst in
Echizen. 
> Did any of the other 7 Yoshitsugu's work in Iron, or were they all
in 
> Shakudo and Shibuichi plate.
> 
> Also, I see the Nidai signed ???? ( Akao Yoshitsugu if the kanji
does
